name: Huawei MateBook X Pro
subtitle: Maybe the best in the world
graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 620 , Nvidia GeForce MX150
description: Cutting edge components that allows it to perform brilliantly, and a battery life that runs rings around many of its rivals. It also has a very competitive price, giving you features, design and performance for quite a bit less money.

name: Dell XPS 13
subtitle: Our editors choice
description: The Dell XPS 13 rocks an 8th-generation Intel Core i5 or i7 processor and a bezel-less ‘Infinity Edge’ display, this Dell XPS 13 continues to be the most popular Windows laptop in the world.

name: Asus ZenBook Flip S UX370
subtitle: incredible 2-in-1 laptop
description: With a new Kaby Lake R 8th-generation processor powering the device, plenty of RAM and a super-fast PCIe SSD in certain models, this is an absolutely stunning laptop. Its 2-in-1 design means you can use it as both a laptop and a tablet.

name: Apple MacBook Pro with Touch Bar 13-inch 2018
subtitle: Improved Over the 2018 model
description: The headline Touch Bar – a thin OLED display at the top of the keyboard which can be used for any number of things, whether that be auto-suggesting words as you type or offering Touch ID so you can log in with just your fingerprint – is again included. It's certainly retained Apple's sense of style.

name: MSI GS65 Stealth
subtitle: The best gaming laptop of 2018
graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 (8GB GDDR5X VRAM, Max-Q)
description: Its subtle design means that it can double as a work or study laptop without raising any eyebrows.

name: Microsoft Surface Laptop 2
subtitle: The best of Microsfot Yet
description: This is a laptop that finally delivers on what Microsoft set out to do with the original: a pure, powerful Windows 10 laptop experience. If you're not sold on the 2-in-1 nature of the Surface Book 2 (which is also on this best laptops list), but love Microsoft's premium build quality and design, then the Surface Laptop 2 is the laptop for you.

name: Acer Predator Helios 300
subtitle: A budget gaming laptop with brilliant performance
graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 + Intel UHD Graphics 630
description: The Acer Predator Helios 300 packs some excellent components, such as a new 8th generation 6-core Intel Core i7 processor, Nvidia GTX 1060 graphics card and 16GB of RAM.

name: Google Pixelbook
subtitle: A premium Chromebook well worth its price
description: The Pixelbook is built to withstand the future. It features a pair of Thunderbolt 3 ports for accessories and super fast file transfers, a hinge that flips inside out for watching movies on planes and a taste of Android.

name: Samsung Notebook 9
subtitle: A beautiful MacBook Pro alternative
description: The Samsung Notebook 9 is still one of the best laptops you can buy in 2018. Packed with more horsepower than the MacBook Pro, but at a much lower price

name: Lenovo Yoga 920
subtitle: The premium model of Lenovo
description: The Lenovo Yoga 920 gets a handful of improvements and added features including a pen-enabled display and eighth-gen Intel processors to make it one of the best premium two-in-ones you can find.

name: Razer Blade (2018)
subtitle: A power house
description: The redesigned Razer Blade moves the bar on slim gaming laptops, with better hardware and a bigger screen, but you'll need a bigger budget for it, too.

name: HP Spectre x360
subtitle: The one who can do Anything
description: A massive amount of innovation into epically thin proportions. The Spectre x360 holds nothing back on performance, bringing the best of all worlds into a PC designed around you. Let yourself fall in love with all the smart technology packed in its sleek design.
